about_the_game:
• This version is a trial version. If the chairman is interested in the follow-up content, please join the wish list. Thank you very much, Orz.



  • 1. You can purchase and build factories, production lines, research and develop products, obtain loans, expand markets, and obtain ISO certification in the game. Through these operations, you can establish a basic business environment for your enterprise. Then, you can advertise, select orders, purchase raw materials, produce products, and submit orders to earn income, allowing you to continue expanding your business.



  • 2. Financial system.In the game, there are accounting entries, balance sheets, income statements, cash flow statements, and DuPont analysis charts. Your actions will have a real-time impact on the financial system, and you will unconsciously learn financial statements during the game.



  • 3. Ranking system.Check your market ranking through the leaderboard to adjust your strategy accordingly.



  • 4. Budget table system.There is an old saying in China that goes, 'If you plan ahead, you will succeed; if you don't plan ahead, you will fail.' You need to make an appropriate budget according to the rules of this bureau to ensure the smooth operation of your business.



  • The official version has added a "random rule system", "AI competitors", "achievement system", and "history system" compared to the trial version. The chairman is welcome to come and experience it
